title: Mathematician

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Perform mathematical theories at someone's house at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will learn a fact about your targets number. You will learn the most specific fact possible.
- You will not learn facts that make it too obvious what the number is, and will instead learn the most specific fact that doesn't go against this attribute. (For example, if only 2 numbers have that fact, you won't learn it). (The host can decide what is reasonable.)

fields.name: Sample Facts (more facts can be added):
fields.value:
- The number is prime.
- The number is a perfect square.
- The number is the same forwards and backwards.
- The number is odd/even.

desc:
Post 456
*"Um, actually, according to my calculations..."*
